Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text:
This place is a hidden gem in Amsterdam and should stay like that.
I found it from thorough online searching and it was beyond my expectations.
I ordered the steak and it was a great portion with fries and salad. Do try it! …

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text: A friend of mine recommend Cafe De Gaeper and my first impression was outstanding. There bartender/owner Dennis was a terrific person, not only was he personable but was very knowledgeable about the food and drink, which is excellent by the …

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text: Great Bar with great and friendly clientele. Highly appreciated the wise advises and conversations with the owner Dennis about beer, culture and Amsterdam. Wonderful evening. Thanks Dennis.

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text: Great little place with a fantastic range of beers and very knowledgeable staff. Decent pub grub too, nothing fancy but good quality and reasonably priced. Pads out the craft beer nicely! Also a cat which is an instant winner in the book of anyone who is anyone.

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text:
Super Lunch time....tasty fish and chips,fresh salad ,delicious beer for a good price...
And great Service!!

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text: Traditional "brown cafe", good choice of beers. Russian Imperial Stout is just great. I liked the music.

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text: Lovely and cozy little bar with plenty of craft beer to choose from!

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text: Great beer selection.  Little small but fun if you can get a seat.

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text: Tiny cozy neighborhood bar with unbelievable fries and Dutch draft.

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text: A great bar with friendly people, nice drinks & tasty food.

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text: Good prices and frendly stuff! Will be happy to visit again 😊

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text: Great Amsterdam classic bar. A place for conversations with friends or strangers.

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text:
Very pleasant place that is not packed with tourists (at least when I visited for late lunch) even though it's in the city center. I've had great meal and service was the best I've had during my ten days visit to Netherlands.
Edit: I forgot to mention, also great draft beer selection.

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text: Lovely bar and great butterballen. They don't accept credit cards though, so bring cash.

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text: What can I say, I made it a point to return to this fantastic cafe and enjoy the warm welcoming hospitality that I was delighted to have after my first visit.  I met the owner Dennis who was tending bar and he couldn't have been a more …

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text: a place where the locals go.  it has a warm and friendly atmosphere.  Dutch drinks are served. Bartender conversation is fine.  If you are looking for a quiet place to escape from the crowd of the center, this is a good choice.

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text: Amazing bar and a gem of the city. Dennis, the owner, made my wife and I welcome during a visit and when I returned several years later I was treated with similar kindness by Mathias. It extends beyond the good pub food and quick drinks, to …

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text: Always good local bar  great toasties, frites and beer.

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text: We are two Irish girls, on a work trip, wasn’t a party holiday nothing like that. Went in because we thought the bar was adorable, had one pint each, and the bill came to 18 EUR. Like I’m sorry I wouldn’t pay 18 euro for a pint in Dublin. …

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text: A very small bar that always manages to fit in a big and diverse crowd. Locals, students, politicians and tourists, everyone will get a warm welcome from Dennis and his staff.

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text: Fantastic little bar/eatery, food was of great quality and reasonably priced! Barman/manager/maybe the owner was super friendly and welcoming. Very clean and cosy atmosphere, I very much reccomend and will return when back in Amsterdam.

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text: After a long day doing Amsterdam things, my friend and I stumbled in here in a lost and shameless manner few Americans can achieve. Almost without saying a word, the bartender instantly showed us how close we were to our hostel with an …

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text: Awesome little place. Good atmosphere, music, food and service. The bartender didn't mind having a chat and recommended some really great beer - Taxels. …

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text:
Coming here early evening after a long day of
exploring Amsterdam is a must, the pints are refreshing. The atmosphere is cosy and wasnt too busy.

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text: Dennis the barman is an absolute legend. Great food, went here with my gf on a weekend trip. Highly recommended to get away from mad tourist hype of central Amsterdam.

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text: I went to this bar early a morning because i could not sleep because of toothache, the lady there was wery understandable because of my pain and she gave me two of her own pills and a glass of water to swallow it :) deffinetly going back there :)

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text: Absolutely amazing place to stay for the lunch/dinner or just snack. Wide range of local beers and really great service. I will recommend it to all my friends.

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text: This was an amazing place, we came with a large group and they handle everything very well. I ordered the burger and it was one of the best burgers I've had in a long time!

Name: Caf√© de Gaeper
Review Text: Amazing atmosphere. Fantastic staff, lovely locale, great beer selection and tasty local snacks. All over a great place to chill in Amsterdam
